concept.title: Groovy Evaluator
concept.shortdesc: The Groovy Evaluator processes data based on Groovy code. Use the Groovy Evaluator processor to use Groovy code to perform custom processing. The Groovy Evaluator supports Groovy version 2.4.

conbody.p: Groovy Evaluator processoroverviewprocessorsGroovy EvaluatorThe Groovy Evaluator can process data one record at a time or one batch at a time.
When you use a Groovy Evaluator in a pipeline, the passes a batch of data to the processor and converts the data to a scripting-friendly data structure for processing.
